patthana16.10:4.1: Abyākataṃ rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.10:4.2: Abyākataṃ rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.10:4.3: Abyākataṃ rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo narūpī ca naakusalo narūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.10:5.4: Hetuyā nava … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
